item.title: 在Google Colab上学习Tensorflow
item.author: 作者
item.description: 挂载Google云端硬盘 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 from google.colab import drive import os drive.mount('/content/drive') data_dir = 'drive/My Drive/dataset-resized' output_dir = 'drive/My Drive/out_put' logs = 'drive/My Drive/logs' os.listdir(data_dir) Drive already mounted at /content/drive; to attempt to forcibly remount, call drive.mount("/content/drive", force_remount=True). 查看被分配的GPU： ! nvidia-smi 1 2 3 4 5
